mapper.select: SELECT m.name member, s.name setmeal, DATE_FORMAT(o.orderDate,"%Y-%m-%d") orderDate, o.orderType FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_member m ON o.member_id = m.id INNER JOIN t_setmeal s ON o.setmeal_id = s.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{date}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{date} and orderStatus = '已到诊'
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >= #{date}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >= #{date} and orderStatus = '已到诊'

SELECT s.name, count(o.id) setmeal_count, count(o.id)/(select count(id) from t_order) proportion FROM t_order o INNER JOIN t_setmeal s ON o.setmeal_id = s.id group by o.setmeal_id order by setmeal_count desc limit #{count}
